cast.original_title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
cast.overview: The classic story of English POWs in Burma forced to build a bridge to aid the war effort of their Japanese captors. British and American intelligence officers conspire to blow up the structure, but Col. Nicholson, the commander who supervised the bridge's construction, has acquired a sense of pride in his creation and tries to foil their plans.
cast.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai

details.biography: Ann Sears was an English actress, best known for The Bridge on the River Kwai (1957), The Flying Doctor (1959) and The Brain (1962). She was married to Michael Holden and Ian Mullins.
details.name: Ann Sears
